S

setAlpha(double) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets SumAlpha parameter: sum over topics of smoothing over doc-topic distributions. alpha_k = [this value] / [num topics]
setBeta(double) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets Beta parameter: smoothing parameter for each topic-word. beta_w = [this value]
setBurnIn(int) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets the number of iterations to run before first estimating dirichlet hyperparameters.
setInputFormat(Instances) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets the format of the input instances.
setNumIterations(int) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets the number of iterations of Gibbs sampling.
setNumThreads(int) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets the number of threads for parallel training.
setNumTopics(int) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets the number of topics to fit.
setNumTopWords(int) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Sets the number of most probable words to print for each topic after model estimation.
setOptions(String[]) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Valid options are: -num-topics Specifies number of Topics (default: 10) -num-top-words The number of most probable words to print for each topic after model estimation.
setStemmer(Stemmer) - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
the stemming algorithm to use, null means no stemming at all (i.e., the NullStemmer is used).
stemmerTipText() - Method in class weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.LDA
Returns the tip text for this property.
